means: 带篷马车，车篷，篷形女用头巾

sentence.Network_en: Once the cab was also passed by a calash rapidly whirled along by two post - horses.
sentence.Network_cn: 有一次,单人马车越过一辆由两匹马拉着正在疾驰的四轮马车.

sentence.Network_en: And he threw himself back in the calash, not this time to sleep, but to think.
sentence.Network_cn: 于是他便往背垫上一靠, 但这一次可不是睡觉而是动脑筋了.
